change.item: Threw out isoc.gk.sgml because first letter of each line was missing. Started from scratch again from isoc.gk.raw. Change markup in accordance with orator dtd
put speeches in numerical order. Consolidated files.

$Log: isoc.l_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.5 2013-09-13 11:21:35 balmas01 reverting texts back to pre_cts_reorg tagged version
Revision 1.3 2011-01-13 03:38:26 gcrane more refinements making these files SDL compatible
Revision 1.2 2011-01-12 16:22:29 gcrane common nouns now reduced to lower case
Revision 1.1 2011-01-05 07:29:57 gcrane base SDL files
Revision 1.1 2009/11/24 20:08:29 rsingh04 moved more xml files around based on copyright status
Revision 1.1 2005/08/01 18:01:19 packel split up letters and speeches
Revision 1.1 2005/07/25 14:37:37 packel Converted to XML
Revision 1.12 2003/07/01 22:17:05 yorkc Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)
Revision 1.11 2000/10/24 16:30:03 lcerrato repetition of end of word in 7.38 eliminated
Revision 1.10 2000/03/22 17:08:04 dasmith Corrected title of fifth letter.
Revision 1.9 2000/03/04 20:34:40 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.8 2000/03/01 22:22:15 dasmith Only look up speeches in the orat. subdoc.
Revision 1.7 2000/03/01 22:15:43 dasmith Can't have tags in change log.
Revision 1.6 2000/03/01 22:14:46 dasmith Erroneously copied <text lang=en> from English file.
Revision 1.5 2000/03/01 22:08:47 dasmith Converted to TEI P3. Wrap letters in DIV1 so we can cite them as "L. 4.3" within doc.
